title: French Revolution: The Storming of the Bastille
content: On July 14, 1789, revolutionaries stormed the Bastille, marking the start of the French Revolution...

title: Madame Du Barry: Life and Downfall
content: Jeanne BÃ©cu, Comtesse du Barry, was a mistress of King Louis XV. She was executed in 1793 during the Reign of Terror.
